titleStmt.title: The London jilt, or, The Politick whore. The second and last part shewing all the artifices and stratagems which the ladies of pleasure make use of for the intreaguing and decoying of men interwoven with several pleasant stories of the misses ingenious performances.
titleStmt.author: Oldys, Alexander.

titleStmt.title: The London jilt, or, The Politick whore. The second and last part shewing all the artifices and stratagems which the ladies of pleasure make use of for the intreaguing and decoying of men interwoven with several pleasant stories of the misses ingenious performances.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Alexander Oldys by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
